attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This is a horrible app there’s just nothing good I can say about this app I hate it so much I will never be using this app again horrible horrible horrible!!!!!!.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app took like a week to finish downloading and it constantly makes my phone crash. This is a horrible app for a horrible president☺️

attributes.title: Delete this app this was terrible
attributes.review: Just terrible and it’s glitchy, it needs to be deleted it doesn’t even work.

attributes.title: ✨t h i s  a p p  s u c k s✨
attributes.review: I got this app and it takes actually months to download and it won’t let me write anything or even log in. This is the worst app I’ve ever even heard of. Don’t recommend.

attributes.title: ARE YOU KIDDING ME
attributes.review: I decided to download this app just to see what it was about and it started off by trying to FORCE me to vote for him and then proceeded to tell me my religion was wrong and showed many signs of homophobia and racism

attributes.title: Not beautiful, not beautiful at all. 👎🏼
attributes.review:
This app is a bad app, a very very bad app, 👌🏼 it’s not good at all. You know who has to be blamed for this....CHINA! Period. CHINA. We need to make America great again by deleting this app. 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣

Gen Z, millennials, you know what to do!

attributes.title: Officially the WORST APP I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: I don’t think an app can get worse than this. It’s so bad that it should be deleted for good. Never use this app and let’s keep tick-tock running!!

attributes.title: absolutely trash
attributes.review: i hadnt even had the app for five minutes and it started to frick up my phone. my phone was glitching out everytime i tried using it, and it heated up sooooo incredibly fast. i’m beyond angry because i have had to purchase a new phone because this stupid excuse for an app completely destroyed my old phone. i’m absolutely infuriated.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app my dog died, this app brings bad luck 😾 who would ever download an app like this!!! I will never be downloading this app ever again. Get this off the app store now

attributes.title: amazing orange man
attributes.review: I was so super excited to dowload the TRUMP 2020 app, but sadly, it constantly fed me false information and ignored larger issues to make our president look better. probably just a glitch! anyways yeah ❤️
